#summary Solution Load Manager Overview

= Introduction =

Extension provides access to load priority settings of solution projects. Each project can be loaded immediately, in background, only if needed, or explicitly.

= Details =

Visual Studio requires a long time to load big solutions. Usually not all of projects should be loaded instantly, for example legacy modules which are rarely changed. The extension allows dramatically reduce solution load time and memory pressure. Every project in solution could be configured separately.
